title: A bill to provide signing and mastery bonuses and mentoring programs for math and science teachers.
content: Amends the Elementary and Secondary Education Act of 1965 to establish grant programs to provide: (1) signing bonuses for middle or secondary school mathematics or science teachers who agree to teach in public schools in high-need areas for four years. And (2) mentor teachers to train, support, and mentor novice teachers of mathematics or science in public elementary or secondary schools.
